Class WordRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • WordRecord
  • public class WordRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    The WordRecord class handles all the functionality regarding individual words. It contains the animation properties like resetting a word, reposition a word and determining how fast the words drop. It also checks if the player's typed in word matches any of the words currently dropping. No changes have been made to this class and it is as the skeleton provided.
